metadata.feature_description: Upload, manage, and optimize images for posts including thumbnails and featured images

steps.action: Navigated to Post Editor and clicked on background image area to open Change Image dialog
steps.expected: Change Image dialog should open with upload options
steps.actual: Change Image dialog opened with Upload File, Stored Location, and From URL tabs

steps.action: Clicked File button and uploaded test_image.png from test_files folder
steps.expected: Image should be uploaded and displayed as background
steps.actual: Image was successfully uploaded and displayed as the post background image

steps.action: Clicked on the Edit button overlay on the background image, then clicked Delete
steps.expected: Image should be removed from the post
steps.actual: Image was successfully deleted and background reverted to default placeholder

steps.action: Opened Change Image dialog and uploaded test_image.jpg (JPEG format)
steps.expected: JPEG image should be uploaded successfully
steps.actual: JPEG image was uploaded and displayed correctly as background

steps.action: With JPEG image already set, clicked Edit to open Change Image dialog
steps.expected: Change Image dialog should open allowing replacement
steps.actual: Dialog opened successfully showing upload options

steps.action: Uploaded test_image.gif to replace existing JPEG
steps.expected: GIF image should replace the existing image
steps.actual: GIF image successfully replaced the JPEG and displayed correctly

steps.action: Opened Change Image dialog and clicked on From URL tab
steps.expected: From URL tab should display URL input field
steps.actual: From URL tab displayed with URL textbox and Insert Image button

steps.action: Clicked Stored Location tab in Change Image dialog
steps.expected: Should display existing images from server
steps.actual: Displayed grid of existing images with search and Recent Uploads filter

steps.action: Selected an existing image from the stored location list and clicked Insert Image
steps.expected: Selected image should be inserted as background
steps.actual: Image was successfully selected and inserted as background

steps.action: Attempted to upload test_unsupported.exe file via Upload File option
steps.expected: System should reject the file with an error message
steps.actual: System displayed error dialog with message 'The file is not an image'

observations: Thumbnails are automatically generated at 210x180 pixels for regular images
Featured image thumbnails are generated at 447x240 pixels
Images are stored in the 'Images/Publisher' folder on the portal
Drag-and-drop upload UI is present but was not tested as file chooser method was used
Upload from URL feature exists in code (UploadFromUrl endpoint) but requires external URL - UI was verified
Multiple image upload UI was not found - the dialog handles one image at a time for background images
File size limits validation was not explicitly tested as no UI indicator of size limits was found
